alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 7:37PM EST until December 19 at 10:31AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Breakabeen. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water reaches Route 30. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.6 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Breakabeen Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 7 pm: 12.2 Forecast: Tue 1 am 12.0 Tue 7 am 10.3 Tue 1 pm 8.5 Tue 7 pm 7.8 Wed 1 am 7.4 Wed 7 am 6.7 Wed 1 pm 6.1 Wed 7 pm 5.6 Thu 1 am 5.2 Thu 7 am 4.9 Thu 1 pm 4.6 &&
